chapter.pericope: The People of God Dwell in Unity

ul.li1: titleA song of ascents. Of David.The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm
1Look, how good and how pleasant it is
when brothers dwell together in unity.
2It is like the fragrant oil upon the head,
running down upon the beard, the beard of Aaron,
that runs down upon the edges of his robes.
3It is like the dew of Hermon that runs down
because there Yahweh commanded the blessingâ€”
